reference_image_path_and_text_pairs: A front view portrait of Mara.
A front view portrait of Noon.
text_prompt:
Create an image following the given description: 
A dynamic action shot's opening frame. The frame is dominated by the foreground featuring a human adult female, mid-30s in perceived age, wearing clothing appropriate for attending a futuristic screening event, connected to a cranial interface, posed at the apex of a lunge, eyes fixed forward. This human figure should reference Image 0 for appearance and clothing. In the middle ground, the figure of an advanced, sophisticated AI entity, embodying pure digital structure, stands partially visible. The AI entity should reference Image 1 for appearance. The ground directly in front of the lunging figure is organic, solid ground.
